pages.text: The fact that you're alive to read this means you've likely landed on a planet with an Earth-like atmosphere and won't burn to death the instant you leave the escape pod. To prevent yourself from overheating or freezing to death, you'll need to manage your body

temperature using a combination of clothing, temperature regulation devices and drinks. You can start by building a campfire to keep warm in colder biomes or at night. If you're in a desert or a similarly hot biome, you might want to consider moving as soon as
possible or spend as much time as possible underground, as your options will be limited.
